General.Name: flyExclusive, Inc.
General.Description: flyExclusive, Inc. owns and operates jet aircraft in North America. It also offers jet charter services; aircraft maintenance, modification, repair, inspection, overhaul operation services; interior and exterior refurbishment services; and aircraft management services, as well as wholesale and retail ad hoc flights, a jet club program, partnership program, fractional program, and other services. The company is headquartered in Kinston, North Carolina.
General.Address: 2860 Jetport Road, Kinston, NC, United States, 28504
